wikipedia_page.main: Paul Darby-Dowman (born 25 November 1977) is a British sprint canoer who competed from the mid-1990s to the mid-2000s (decade). Competing in three Summer Olympics, he earned his best finish of seventh in the K-2 1000 m event at Athens in 2004.

link_mentions.page: Great Britain at the 2004 Summer Olympics
Great Britain at the 2000 Summer Olympics

response: In the same year he won the silver medal in the same event at  the European Championships at Poznań, Poland, as well as the bronze in the K-2 1000 m with partner Paul Darby-Dowman.
